landing.title: discover AI in the kitchen, one recipe at a time
landing.subtitle: coming this fall

botAndRecipes.title: Discover ai.Cook
botAndRecipes.subtitle: Experience the future of cooking with your intelligent culinary assistant

descriptions.1: Just decide what you’d like to enjoy – ai.Cook takes care of the rest.
descriptions.2: Your ingredients are automatically detected. Simply share your taste, available time, and preferred complexity level.
descriptions.3: Browse curated recipe suggestions and get inspired for your next meal.
descriptions.4: ai.Cook’s recipe collection grows daily with fresh creations to surprise your palate.
descriptions.5: Our culinary algorithms recommend the perfect dishes based on your pantry and lifestyle.
descriptions.6: We designed our recipes to be as beautiful as they are delicious: clear, visual, and effortless to follow.
descriptions.7: Not sure about an ingredient or measurement? Ask our integrated chatbot for instant support.
descriptions.8: In seconds, get your top 3 recipes matched to your pantry, diet, and taste.
descriptions.9: Want more? Explore variations, ingredient swaps, or pro culinary tips.

product.title: Smart Organization
product.subtitle: Manage your pantry with intelligent organization and AI-powered insights

descriptions.1: Add ingredients in seconds – choose from our enriched database or create your own.
descriptions.2: Build your personal pantry list with essentials or favorite items.
descriptions.3: Enter a quantity and let ai.Cook handle the rest.
descriptions.4: Nutrition, freshness, and availability tracked automatically by AI.
descriptions.5: View and manage all your ingredients effortlessly.
descriptions.6: Organize by categories, diets, intolerances, and more.
